original_text: I will punish you very much, because that is what you deserve. You have lived in a wicked way and you have done evil things. My punishment will give you pain that goes all through you.’ Jeremiah is very upset I will punish you very much, because that is what you deserve. You have lived in a wicked way and you have done evil things. My punishment will give you pain that goes all through you.’ Jeremiah is very upset I will punish you very much, because that is what you deserve. You have lived in a wicked way and you have done evil things. My punishment will give you pain that goes all through you.’
korean_text: 네 길과 행위가 이 일들을 부르게 하였나니 이는 네가 악함이라 그 고통이 네 마음에까지 미치느니라

sentences.original_text: I will punish you very much
because that is what you deserve
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 네가 받아야 할 것이기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: You have lived in a wicked way
and you have done evil things
My punishment will give you pain
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 벌은 너에게 고통을 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: that goes all through you
